{{ _('

Admission to RDFZ high school is dependent on students' Zhongkao (high school entrance exam) score.

In addition to the Zhongkao, admission to RDFZ Chinese-Foreign Education Program also depends on interviews and extra exams that test math and English.

Year after year, both the national and international curricula have continually increasing application to admission ratios.

The admission score for the Chinese National Curriculum is among the highest in Beijing.
